interlinear-text.item: You should come to Kuybish sometime

phrase.item: You should come to Kuybish sometime, write a song about it and come.
To visit Xojamaston, if you know it [the place] then come.
Shoqimbar is in Wakhan, and Xijamaston in Kuybish.
They are both very close to each other, you should come to Kuybish sometime.
Both Kuybish and Pamir, they are not far from each other.
They are connected like a chain, you should come to Kuybish sometime.
I directed the water channel toward there.
There is my dream and desire.
You should come to Kuybish sometime.
